Dialogue: Scientists conduct experiments in the burned out building.
CINNABAR GYM's BLAINE is an odd man who has lived here for decades.

name: Center 1
Dialogue:
Do you have any friends? POKEMON you get in trades grow very
quickly. I think it's worth a try!

name: Center 2
Dialogue:
POKEMON can still learn techniques after canceling evolution.
Evolution can wait until new moves have been learned.

name: Center 3
Dialogue:
You can cancel evolution. When a POKEMON is evolving, you can
stop it and leave it the way it is.

name: Mart 4
Dialogue: It never hurts to have extra items!

name: Mart 5
Dialogue: Don't they have X ATTACK? It's good for battles!

name: Picture
Dialogue: A photo of the LAB's founder, DR.FUJI!

We study POKEMON extensively here. People often bring us rare
POKEMON for examination.
Hello there! Do you want to trade your RAICHU for ELECTRODE?
Well, if you don't want to...
Hmmm? This isn't RAICHU. Think of me when you get one.
Okay, connect the cable like so!
Thanks!

I found this very strange fossil in MT.MOON! I think it's a rare,
prehistoric POKEMON!
Hi! Do you have VENONAT? Want to trade it for TANGELA?
That's too bad.
...That is no VENONAT. If you get one, trade it with me!
Okay, connect the cable like so!
Thanks pal!

name: Computer Lab
Dialogue: There's an e-mail message! ...

The 3 legendary bird POKEMON are ARTICUNO, ZAPDOS, and MOLTRES.
Their whereabouts are unknown. We plan to explore the cavern
close to CERULEAN.
From: POKEMON RESEARCH TEAM
EEVEE can evolve into 1 of 3 kinds of POKEMON.
Tch-tch-tch! I made a cool TM! It can cause all kinds of fun!
Your pack is crammed full!

Tch-tch-tch! That's the sound of a METRONOME! It tweaks your
POKEMON's brain into using moves it doesn't know!

name: 11 after
Dialogue:
Tch-tch-tch! That's the sound of a METRONOME! It tweaks your
POKEMON's brain into using moves it doesn't know!
I'm looking for PONYTA! Wanna trade one for SEEL?
Awww! Oh well...
What? That's not PONYTA! If you get one, come back here!
Okay, connect the cable like so!
Hey thanks!

Hiya! I am important doctor! I study here rare POKEMON fossils!
You! Have you a fossil for me?
No! Is too bad!

Oh! That is <DOME FOSSIL/HELIX FOSSIL/OLD AMBER>! It is fossil of
<OMANYTE/KABUTO/AERODACTYL>, a POKEMON that is already extinct!
My Resurrection Machine will make that POKEMON live again!
Aiyah! You come again!

So! You hurry and give me that! I take a little time!
You go for walk a little while!

name: 13 after
Dialogue: Hiya! I am important doctor!

name: Statues exam
Dialogue: A secret switch! Press it?
Not quite yet!
Who wouldn't?

name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: Who are you? There shouldn't be anyone here.

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: A key? I don't know what you're talking about.

name: Diary 1
Dialogue:
July 5
Guyana, South America
A new POKEMON was discovered deep in the jungle.

name: Diary 2
Dialogue:
July 10
We christened the newly discovered POKEMON, MEW.

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: I can't get out! This old place is one big puzzle!

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: Switches open and close alternating sets of doors!

name: Diary 3
Dialogue:
Feb. 6
MEW gave birth. We named the newborn MEWTWO.

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: This place is like, huge!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: I wonder where my partner went.

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: My mentor once lived here.

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: So, you're stuck? Try jumping off over there!

name: Diary 4
Dialogue:
Sept. 1
MEWTO is far too powerful. We have failed to curb its vicious
tendencies...

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: Uh-oh. Where am I now?

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: You can find stuff lying around.

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: This place is ideal for a lab.

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: I like it here! It's conducive to my studies!

name: Signpost Gym
Dialogue:
CINNABAR ISLAND POKEMON GYM
LEADER: BLAINE
The Hot-Headed Quiz Master!

name: Plaque
Dialogue: WINNING TRAINERS:Rival

name: Gym 1
Dialogue:
Yo! Champ in making! The hot-headed BLAINE is a fire POKEMON pro!
Douse his spirits with water! You better take some BURN HEALS!

name: Gym 1 after
Dialogue: Player! You beat that fire brand!

name: Trainer 1 Gym
Dialogue: I was a thief, but I became straight as a trainer!

name: Trainer 1 Gym after
Dialogue: I can't help stealing other people's POKEMON!

name: Trainer 2 Gym
Dialogue: Do you know how hot POKEMON fire breath can get?

name: Trainer 2 Gym after
Dialogue:
Fire, or to be more precise, combustion...
Blah, blah, blah, blah...

name: Trainer 3 Gym
Dialogue: You can't win! I have studied POKEMON totally!

name: Trainer 3 Gym after
Dialogue: My theories are too complicated for you!

name: Trainer 4 Gym
Dialogue: I just like using fire POKEMON!

name: Trainer 4 Gym after
Dialogue: I wish there was a thief POKEMON! I'd use that!

name: Trainer 5 Gym
Dialogue: I know why BLAINE became a trainer!

name: Trainer 5 Gym after
Dialogue:
BLAINE was lost in the mountains when a fiery bird POKEMON
appeared. It's light enabled BLAINE to find his way down!

name: Trainer 6 Gym
Dialogue: I've been to many GYMs, but this is my favorite!

name: Trainer 6 Gym after
Dialogue: Us fire POKEMON fans like PONYTA and NINETALES!

name: Trainer 7 Gym
Dialogue: Fire is weak against H2O!

name: Trainer 7 Gym after
Dialogue: Water beats fire! But, fire melts ice POKEMON!

name: Blaine
Dialogue:
Hah! I am BLAINE! I am the LEADER of CINNABAR GYM! My fiery
POKEMON will incinerate all challengers! Hah! You better have
BURN HEAL!

name: Blaine after
Dialogue:
FIRE BLAST is the ultimate fire technique! Don't waste it on
water POKEMON!

name: Question 1
Dialogue:
POKEMON Quiz! Get it right and the door opens to the next room!
Get it wrong and face a trainer! If you want to conserve your
POKEMON for the GYM LEADER... Then get it right! Here we go!
CATERPIE evolves into BUTTERFREE?
Sorry! Bad call!
You're absolutely correct! Go on through!

name: Question 2
Dialogue: There are 9 certified POKEMON LEAGUE BADGEs?

name: Question 3
Dialogue: POLIWAG evolves 3 times?

name: Question 4
Dialogue: Are thunder moves effective against ground element-type POKEMON?

name: Question 5
Dialogue: POKEMON of the same kind and level are not identical?

name: Question 6
Dialogue: TM28 contains TOMBSTONER?
